different from most or all other countries. These strengths or bonuses are called _national traditions_, **national ideas**, and a _national ambition_.\n\nEach [country](/Country \"Country\")\n starts with _national traditions_, two bonuses that define the history and heritage of the country.\n\nAs players purchase ideas, they will unlock _national ideas_ as well, one for every three ideas purchased, until all seven national ideas have been unlocked. National ideas do not cost [monarch points](/Monarch_points \"Monarch points\")\n of their own but are unlocked free of charge in a pre-set order.\n\nWhen the final national idea is unlocked, the national ambition is also unlocked.\n\nMost countries have unique national ideas, but some have a generic set based on their region or culture - for example, one set of ideas is shared by the Maghrebi nations, while another set is shared by the Muslim sultanates of India.\n\nThere are currently 417 unique idea sets, 11 \"upgraded\"/alternative sets, 91 group sets, 2 \"easter egg\" sets, and 8 sets exclusive to the Crusader Kings 2 save-game converter, plus the default set of ideas for a grand total of **530** sets.\n\nSwap National ideas\n-------------------\n\nWhen a new nation is formed or the government is reformed this event is triggered, to swap to the new NIs or to keep the old one:\n\nid\n\n### ![Msg event.png](https://eu4.paradoxwikis.com/images/4/4e/Msg_event.png)New Traditions & Ambitions\n\n|     |     |\n| --- | --- |\n| ![Ambox outdated info.png](https://central.paradoxwikis.com/images/thumb/6/65/Ambox_outdated_info.png/22px-Ambox_outdated_info.png) | Please help with verifying or updating this infobox. different from most or all other countries. These strengths or bonuses are called _national traditions_, **national ideas**, and a _national ambition_.\n\nEach [country](/Country \"Country\")\n starts with _national traditions_, two bonuses that define the history and heritage of the country.\n\nAs players purchase ideas, they will unlock _national ideas_ as well, one for every three ideas purchased, until all seven national ideas have been unlocked. National ideas do not cost [monarch points](/Monarch_points \"Monarch points\")\n of their own but are unlocked free of charge in a pre-set order.\n\nWhen the final national idea is unlocked, the national ambition is also unlocked.\n\nMost countries have unique national ideas, but some have a generic set based on their region or culture - for example, one set of ideas is shared by the Maghrebi nations, while another set is shared by the Muslim sultanates of India.\n\nThere are currently 417 unique idea sets, 11 \"upgraded\"/alternative sets, 91 group sets, 2 \"easter egg\" sets, and 8 sets exclusive to the Crusader Kings 2 save-game converter, plus the default set of ideas for a grand total of **530** sets.\n\nSwap National ideas\n-------------------\n\nWhen a new nation is formed or the government is reformed this event is triggered, to swap to the new NIs or to keep the old one:\n\nid\n\n### ![Msg event.png](/images/4/4e/Msg_event.png)New Traditions & Ambitions\n\n|     |     |\n| --- | --- |\n| ![Ambox outdated info.png](https://central.paradoxwikis.com/images/thumb/6/65/Ambox_outdated_info.png/22px-Ambox_outdated_info.png) | Please help with verifying or updating this infobox.
